verses.verse: The <S%H4633>preparations<s%> of the <S%H3820>heart<s%> in <S%H120>man,<s%> and the <S%H4617>answer<s%> of the <S%H3956>tongue,<s%> is from the <S%H4480>LORD.<s%> <S%H3068><s%>
All <S%H3605><s%> the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of a <S%H376>man<s%> are <S%H2134>clean<s%> in his own <S%H5869>eyes;<s%> but the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8505>weigheth<s%> the <S%H7307>spirits.<s%>
Commit <S%H1556><s%> thy <S%H4639>works<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and thy <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> shall be <S%H3559>established.<s%>
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H6466>made<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> things for <S%H4617>himself:<s%> yea, <S%H1571>even<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> for the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H7451>evil.<s%>

Every <S%H3605>one<s%> that is <S%H1362>proud<s%> in <S%H3820>heart<s%> is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> though <S%H3027>hand<s%> join in <S%H3027>hand,<s%> he shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H5352>unpunished.<s%>

By <S%H2617>mercy<s%> and <S%H571>truth<s%> <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> is <S%H3722>purged:<s%> and by the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> men <S%H5493>depart<s%> from <S%H4480>evil.<s%> <S%H7451><s%>
When a <S%H376>man's<s%> <S%H1870>ways<s%> <S%H7521>please<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> he maketh <S%H1571>even<s%> his <S%H341>enemies<s%> to be at <S%H7999>peace<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> him.
Better <S%H2896><s%> is a <S%H4592>little<s%> with <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> than <S%H4480>great<s%> <S%H7230><s%> <S%H8393>revenues<s%> <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H4941>right.<s%>
A <S%H120>man's<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H2803>deviseth<s%> his <S%H1870>way:<s%> but the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3559>directeth<s%> his <S%H6806>steps.<s%>
A divine <S%H7081>sentence<s%> is <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H8193>lips<s%> of the <S%H4428>king:<s%> his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H4603>transgresseth<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> in <S%H4941>judgment.<s%>
A <S%H4941>just<s%> <S%H6425>weight<s%> and <S%H3976>balance<s%> are the <S%H3068>LORD's:<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H68>weights<s%> of the <S%H3599>bag<s%> are his <S%H4639>work.<s%>

It is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to <S%H4428>kings<s%> to <S%H6213>commit<s%> <S%H7562>wickedness:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3678>throne<s%> is <S%H3559>established<s%> by <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>
Righteous <S%H6664><s%> <S%H8193>lips<s%> are the <S%H7522>delight<s%> of <S%H4428>kings;<s%> and they <S%H157>love<s%> him that <S%H1696>speaketh<s%> <S%H3477>right.<s%>
The <S%H2534>wrath<s%> of a <S%H4428>king<s%> is as <S%H4397>messengers<s%> of <S%H4194>death:<s%> but a <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> will <S%H3722>pacify<s%> it.
In the <S%H216>light<s%> of the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H6440>countenance<s%> is <S%H2416>life;<s%> and his <S%H7522>favor<s%> is as a <S%H5645>cloud<s%> of the latter <S%H4456>rain.<s%>

How <S%H4100>much<s%> <S%H2896>better<s%> is it to <S%H7069>get<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> than <S%H4480>gold!<s%> <S%H2742><s%> and to <S%H7069>get<s%> <S%H998>understanding<s%> rather to be <S%H977>chosen<s%> than <S%H4480>silver!<s%> <S%H3701><s%>

The <S%H4546>highway<s%> of the <S%H3477>upright<s%> is to <S%H5493>depart<s%> from <S%H4480>evil:<s%> <S%H7451><s%> he that <S%H5341>keepeth<s%> his <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H8104>preserveth<s%> his <S%H5315>soul.<s%>
Pride <S%H1347><s%> goeth <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7667>destruction,<s%> and a <S%H1363>haughty<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> a <S%H3783>fall.<s%>

Better <S%H2896><s%> it is to be of a <S%H8217>humble<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> the <S%H6035>lowly,<s%> than to <S%H4480>divide<s%> <S%H2505><s%> the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> the <S%H1343>proud.<s%>
He that handleth a matter <S%H7919>wisely<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H1697><s%> shall <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H2896>good:<s%> and whoso <S%H982>trusteth<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H835>happy<s%> is he.
The <S%H2450>wise<s%> in <S%H3820>heart<s%> shall be <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H995>prudent:<s%> and the <S%H4986>sweetness<s%> of the <S%H8193>lips<s%> <S%H3254>increaseth<s%> <S%H3948>learning.<s%>
Understanding <S%H7922><s%> is a <S%H4726>wellspring<s%> of <S%H2416>life<s%> unto him that <S%H1167>hath<s%> it: but the <S%H4148>instruction<s%> of <S%H191>fools<s%> is <S%H200>folly.<s%>
The <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H7919>teacheth<s%> his <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and <S%H3254>addeth<s%> <S%H3948>learning<s%> <S%H5921>to<s%> his <S%H8193>lips.<s%>
Pleasant <S%H5278><s%> <S%H561>words<s%> are as a <S%H6688>honeycomb,<s%> <S%H1706><s%> <S%H4966>sweet<s%> to the <S%H5315>soul,<s%> and <S%H4832>health<s%> to the <S%H6106>bones.<s%>
There <S%H3426>is<s%> a <S%H1870>way<s%> that <S%H6440>seemeth<s%> <S%H3477>right<s%> unto a <S%H376>man,<s%> but the <S%H319>end<s%> thereof are the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of <S%H4194>death.<s%>
He <S%H5315><s%> that <S%H6001>laboreth<s%> <S%H5998>laboreth<s%> for himself; <S%H3588>for<s%> his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H404>craveth<s%> it <S%H5921>of<s%> him.
An <S%H1100>ungodly<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> diggeth <S%H3738>up<s%> <S%H7451>evil:<s%> and <S%H5921>in<s%> his <S%H8193>lips<s%> there is as a <S%H6867>burning<s%> <S%H784>fire.<s%>
A <S%H8419>froward<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7971>soweth<s%> <S%H4066>strife:<s%> and a <S%H5372>whisperer<s%> <S%H6504>separateth<s%> chief <S%H441>friends.<s%>
A <S%H2555>violent<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6601>enticeth<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> and <S%H1980>leadeth<s%> him into the <S%H1870>way<s%> that is <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2896>good.<s%>
He <S%H6095>shutteth<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> to <S%H2803>devise<s%> froward <S%H8419>things:<s%> <S%H7169>moving<s%> his <S%H8193>lips<s%> he bringeth evil to <S%H3615>pass.<s%> <S%H7451><s%>
The <S%H7872>hoary<s%> head is a <S%H5850>crown<s%> of <S%H8597>glory,<s%> if it be <S%H4672>found<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>

He that is <S%H750>slow<s%> to <S%H639>anger<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> than the <S%H4480>mighty;<s%> <S%H1368><s%> and he that <S%H4910>ruleth<s%> his <S%H7307>spirit<s%> than he that <S%H4480>taketh<s%> <S%H3920><s%> a <S%H5892>city.<s%>
<S%H853><s%> The <S%H1486>lot<s%> is <S%H2904>cast<s%> into the <S%H2436>lap;<s%> but the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H4941>disposing<s%> thereof is of the <S%H4480>LORD.<s%> <S%H3068><s%>
